programme.title: Let Love Grow
programme.desc: Landscape architect Evie has met her match with her new client, stubborn archaeologist Ryan, but his daughters, Zoey and Aria, love Evie, and she soon finds herself the unwitting victim of “Operation Grow a Girlfriend.” As the girls execute their best parent trap schemes, Evie gets to know a new side of Ryan, and she finds herself torn between her ex-boyfriend Mark and this handsome single dad.

programme.title: The Lost Medallion: The Adventures of Billy Stone
programme.desc: A man who steps into a foster home to drop off some donations tells the kids a story about two teenage friends who uncover a long-lost medallion that transports them back in time.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Passport to Love
programme.desc: Nicole, a successful travel blogger, meets Kade, a marketing rep for a travel publishing company, and they form the beginnings of a relationship while exploring an island destination. They juggle their work traveling around the world while seeing each other again. Both know there’s something special between them, but it will be put to the test when Kade’s competitive boss challenges Kade to thwart Nicole’s business.

programme.title: A Taste of Tuscany
programme.desc: April is a health chef guru who goes to Italy to learn how to incorporate the country’s rich culture of food in her own recipes. April finds new joy and freedom in life and cooking – and also love.

programme.title: A Toast to Love
programme.desc: A marine archeologist finds wine in a shipwreck. If she hopes to save her research program she must discover the love story behind the wine.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A young, flirtatious barista is bored with her social lifestyle and longs for real love. So when an eligible, handsome guy walks into her coffee shop, she turns on the charm, but he doesn’t respond to her flirting like men usually do. When she discovers that he runs a ministry that builds affordable housing, she decides to volunteer.

programme.title: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Marc Reid, a romance novelist, is set up on a blind date by his over-excited sister. Marc, a little less than enthusiastic, ends up picking up the wrong girl from the apartment complex.

programme.title: The Lost Medallion: The Adventures of Billy Stone
programme.desc: A man who steps into a foster home to drop off some donations tells the kids a story about two teenage friends who uncover a long-lost medallion that transports them back in time.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Passport to Love
programme.desc: Nicole, a successful travel blogger, meets Kade, a marketing rep for a travel publishing company, and they form the beginnings of a relationship while exploring an island destination. They juggle their work traveling around the world while seeing each other again. Both know there’s something special between them, but it will be put to the test when Kade’s competitive boss challenges Kade to thwart Nicole’s business.

programme.title: A Taste of Tuscany
programme.desc: April is a health chef guru who goes to Italy to learn how to incorporate the country’s rich culture of food in her own recipes. April finds new joy and freedom in life and cooking – and also love.

programme.title: A Toast to Love
programme.desc: A marine archeologist finds wine in a shipwreck. If she hopes to save her research program she must discover the love story behind the wine.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A young, flirtatious barista is bored with her social lifestyle and longs for real love. So when an eligible, handsome guy walks into her coffee shop, she turns on the charm, but he doesn’t respond to her flirting like men usually do. When she discovers that he runs a ministry that builds affordable housing, she decides to volunteer.

programme.title: Not Cinderella’s Type
programme.desc: Indy lives with her aunt and uncle and believes her life is fine until an accident brings a new guy into her life. Bryant Bailey is not Indy's type - she's never been into guys like him. But then again, she's never really known anyone so stubborn and caring that can also help her discover who she is and what she's worth. A modern telling of Cinderella, based on the novel by Jenni James.
